description: A React component for displaying, creating, signing up for, and deleting meals within a shared meal planning application. Includes admin controls for creating new meals.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the list of meals from the server and updates state.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Handles creation of a new meal via form submission.

methods.name: onSignup
methods.description: Signs the current user up for the selected meal.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a meal if confirmed by the user.
